Package de.maxhenkel.voicechat.api.packets

Interface LocationalSoundPacket

All Superinterfaces:
ConvertablePacket, Packet, SoundPacket
public interface LocationalSoundPacket extends SoundPacket
The receiver of this event will hear the sound from the specified location. If the location is further away than the maximum voice distance, the receiving player won't actually hear the sound.
